meta.description: Optimize the production of crepe cakes, sponge cakes, and birthday cakes to maximize profit given resource constraints.

sets.name: CAKES
sets.description: Types of cakes produced by the bakery

params.name: batter_requirement
params.description: Batter required per cake type in grams

params.name: milk_requirement
params.description: Milk required per cake type in grams

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per cake type in dollars

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of cake to produce

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selling cakes

constraints.name: batter_constraint
constraints.description: Total batter used cannot exceed available batter

constraints.name: milk_constraint
constraints.description: Total milk used cannot exceed available milk
